Title: Soft Skills
Description: With 8 years experience in fast paced, high pressure and time sensitive work environments coupled with just over 3 of those years as management it has allowed me to greatly develop the following soft skills among others.

Title: Creativity
Description: My creative suite of choice has always been Adobe for their powerful software, mass of tutorials and comprehensive cover when it comes to creating digital content for multi-platform consumption.

Title: Full Stack
Description: My time at Code Institute exposed me to many languages, learning methods and frameworks. In short I developed a strong bedrock to serve as the foundation of my future endevours and self learning.
